nodes.text: The Golden Venture building was a building that was located in the city Hedrett, on the planet Cularin.

The building was constructed for use as an office building by a corporation that planned to make large amounts of profit from activities in the jungles of Cularin. However, when the planet's native species, the Tarasin, objected to the firm's operations on the world, the corporation left Cularin and abandoned the building. The building was then sold for use as an apartment complex for wealthy individuals. The assassins Haque and Zlash both became residents of the building.
